question_title: How many people will be added to the Viasna Belarusian political prisoners tracker in September 2025?
search_query: How many people will be added to the Viasna Belarusian political prisoners tracker in September 2025?

search_results.title: Second Congress on Political Prisoners in Belarus #WithoutJustCause - Sviatlana Tsikhanouskaya
search_results.text:
As of August 27, 2025, according to human rights defenders, Belarus has 1,335 recognized political prisoners. 
 The #WithoutJustCause Congress is a two-day gathering of NGOs, initiatives, political prisoners, human rights defenders, and activists. Two days, two cities, one goal — to come together on one platform, unite efforts, and coordinate work for the release and support of political prisoners. 
 September 26, Warsaw. The first day of the Congress will be dedicated to: 
 
 The overall human rights situation in Belarus. 
 New trends in political repression against Belarusians. 
 The work of political structures on the release and support of political prisoners. 
 
 September 28, Poznań. The second day of the Congress will be a platform for meetings, sharing ideas and problems, negotiating, and finding solutions: 
 
 Activity Fair – a space where every organization or initiative helping political prisoners can present their work. 
 Presentations by specialized NGOs and initiatives.

 This report is based on aggregated information collected by the PEN Belarus monitoring group during the first half of 2025 from open sources, personal contacts, and direct communication with cultural figures. If you wish to report violations (including confidentially) or correct inaccuracies, please contact us at  [email protected],  t.me/viadoma. The more accurately we can record and analyse the human rights situation in the cultural sphere, the more effectively we can plan our work to support cultural figures and culture-related projects. More information about the monitoring is available here.

search_results.title: Belarus releases US citizen who was jailed for years
search_results.text:
[Skip to content](https://www.westernmassnews.com/2025/04/30/belarus-releases-us-citizen-who-was-jailed-years/#main)

TALLINN, Estonia (AP) — Belarus on Wednesday released a U.S. citizen who had been jailed on allegations of plotting to assassinate the country’s authoritarian leader, charges his supporters and the U.S. government called bogus.

Youras Ziankovich, a lawyer who has dual Belarusian and U.S. citizenship, was convicted on a number of charges, including plotting a coup against [Belarus President Alexander Lukashenko](https://apnews.com/hub/alexander-lukashenko), and given an 11-year sentence in September 2022. He then had six months added to his sentence later that year.

In August 2024, a court in Belarus handed Ziankovich an additional two-year sentence on charges of “malicious disobedience to the prison administration,” bringing his overall prison term to 13 1/2 years.

The U.S. government on Wednesday identified the man as Youras Ziankovich but his name has also been ren

search_results.title: Belarus leader Lukashenko pardons 32 prisoners ...
search_results.text:
![FILE - Belarus President Alexander Lukashenko addresses supporters at Independence Square in Minsk, Belarus, on Aug. 16, 2020. (AP Photo, File)](https://www.aljazeera.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/AP24283558785205-1732171391.jpg?resize=770%2C513&quality=80)

Belarus President Alexander Lukashenko has pardoned 32 political prisoners before the January 2025 election \[AP Photo\]

Published On 21 Nov 202421 Nov 2024

Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko has pardoned dozens of political prisoners, his office said, but critics warned that the [crackdown on dissent](https://www.aljazeera.com/features/longform/2022/3/17/how-dissent-was-crushed-in-belarus) continues, with more than 1,000 people still imprisoned since mass demonstrations in 2020.

The 32 prisoners pardoned were “convicted of extremist crimes”, the presidency said in a statement on Wednesday. Seventeen of them suffer from chronic diseases and nine were older than 50.

## Recommended Stories

list of 3 itemslist 1 of 3

The ratings are based on a scale of 1 to 7, with 7 representing the highest level of democratic progress and 1 the lowest. The Democracy Score is an average of ratings for the categories tracked in a given year. The Democracy Percentage, introduced in 2020, is a translation of the Democracy Score to the 0-100 scale, where 0 equals least democratic and 100 equals most democratic.

metadata.title: How many people will be added to the Viasna Belarusian political prisoners tracker in September 2025?
metadata.description:
According to Viasna: 

> Human Rights Center "Viasna" is a non-governmental human rights organization, created in 1996 during mass protest actions of the democratic opposition in Belarus. Viasna was initially a group created to help the arrested rally participants and their families.  That’s why originally Viasna had the name “Viasna-96”. On 15 June 1999 the organization was registered as the Human Rights Center "Viasna". It is a national NGO with the central office in Minsk and regional organizations in the majority of Belarusian cities. Viasna has about 200 members all over the country.

In recent months the numbers have been: 

| Month   | Count |
| ------- | ----: |
| 2024-07 |    13 |
| 2024-08 |    17 |
| 2024-09 |    27 |
| 2024-10 |    37 |
| 2024-11 |    16 |
| 2024-12 |    16 |
| 2025-01 |    10 |
| 2025-02 |    15 |
| 2025-03 |    13 |
| 2025-04 |    15 |
| 2025-05 |    15 |
| 2025-06 |    11 |
| 2025-07 |     3 |

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":39342,"question_id":38719}}`
metadata.resolution_criteria: This question resolves as the number of entries shown at the [List of political prisoners and persons convicted in political criminal cases](https://prisoners.spring96.org/en/list?status[]=0\&view=1) database maintained by the [Viasna Human Rights Center](https://spring96.org/en), minus 1,191, when accessed by Metaculus on or after October 1, 2025. For example, if the number displayed is 1,201 then the resolution amount would be 10.
metadata.fine_print: No other resolution source will be used to resolve this question, including Viasna's social media accounts or any other sources. Only the Viasna website's [List of political prisoners and persons convicted in political criminal cases ](https://prisoners.spring96.org/en/list?status[]=0\&view=1)will be used, including the CSV file (which can be downloaded from[ this link](https://prisoners.spring96.org/en/export/csv?status%5B0%5D=0\&view=1)), which as of August 30, 2025 showed 1,191 entries.
